title: By the King. A proclamation. Containing his Majesties gracious pardon and indemnity
author: Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most Sacred Majesty,
notes: Dated at end: Given at Our court, at Windsor Castle, the twenty seventh day of July, one thousand six hundred seventy and nine.
Arms 232; Steele notation: Defender  All  thretti-.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C.
